Medium Armour Master

When you wear Medium Armour, it doesn‘t impose Disadvantage on Stealth Checks. The bonus to Armour Class you can gain from your Dexterity Modifier also becomes +3 instead of +2.

Medium Armour Master is a Feat and a Feature in Baldur's Gate 3. Feats are special talents or expertises that provide special capabilities to characters. At certain levels, your character will get to choose between an Ability Score Improvement Feature or a Feat. (Note this feat is not available in EA and all info is subject to change.)

BG3 Medium Armour Master Information

When you wear Medium Armour, it doesn‘t impose Disadvantage on Stealth Checks. The bonus to Armour Class you can gain from your Dexterity Modifier also becomes +3 instead of +2.

How to unlock Medium Armour Master in BG3

You'll need to fulfill the following requirements to unlock Medium Armour Master

All Classes at Lvl 4

BG3 Medium Armour Master Tips & Notes

Removes disadvantage on stealth checks when wearing medium armor and boosts the armor bonus from Dexterity. It's useful for dexterity-focused characters who want more protection and remain stealthy. Notes & Tips go here
